UnitType.Description: Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.
Barons are powerful melee units, able to do lots of damage to those that fall within their range.
Warg riders are excellent for scouting out unknown areas, and escaping when they uncover dangers in those areas.
Axeman are good early skirmishers, though they can't wield shields their Cleave ability allows them to attack multiple enemies at once.
The Chosen are outfitted with enchanted weapons and items. They are a powerful tool for any empire, but expensive to train.
The Scourge are good midgame units for your armies. Although they aren't as well trained as other faction's soldiers they can be trained quickly and overwhelm the enemy.
A peasant armed with a crude club.
Use scouts to explore the world.
Spearmen are effective against well armored enemies.
Archers are lightly equipped and skilled at picking off their opponents at a distance.
Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.
Barons are powerful melee units, able to do lots of damage to those that fall within their range.
Mages deal magical damage at range, use them to decimate enemies that rely on physical defense.
Slayers are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.
Swordsmen are great midgame units. Their swords leave a hand free for a shield and their counterattack ability allows them to strike back at enemies that attack them.
A peasant armed with a crude club.
Use scouts to explore the world.
Archers are lightly equipped and skilled at picking off their opponents at a distance.
Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.
Barons are powerful melee units, able to do lots of damage to those that fall within their range.
Mages deal magical damage at range, use them to decimate enemies that rely on physical defense.
Platinum Knights are have their equipment enchanted to deal fire, cold and lightning damage which allows them to deal damage to any opponent.
Silver Swordsmen are good midgame units for your armies. Although they are more expensive than other faction's soldiers, not one questions their effectiveness.

Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.

Warriors are good early skirmishers, quick to train and good in most battles.
Mages deal magical damage at range, use them to decimate enemies that rely on physical defense.
Paladins are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.
The Chosen are outfitted with enchanted weapons and items. They are a powerful tool for any empire, but expensive to train.
